Name: ToS Gamepad Tester
About the game: Takeover Studios (ToS) Gamepad Tester is all about testing functionality and helping you figure out any issues with your gamepad! Whether it is connectivity, button input, buttons double inputting, stick drift, sticks not inputting correct values, rumble motor issues; you can test it all in ToS Gamepad Tester!
